page.title: 16Industries and Employment
page.content: Numbers employed by industries are: Metapic 60, Fastnaparts 106, Special Steels 11, Valley Spring 20, Ryro Engineering 9, Oswald Record 12, Alloy Steel and Iron Co. 33. Traditional Derbyshire Stoneware pottery is made by Pearsons on Pottery Lane by their one hundred employees. 20% of their products are exported mainly to Australia, Europe & America. Waldo Ltd. on Avenue Road employs 50 people and manufacture three-piece suites, chairs settees and tables. Remploy Medical Products Division on Sheffield Road employs 160 people of whom 122 are severely disabled. They manufacture surgical shoes, walking aids and other surgical appliances and rehabilitation equipment which is distributed throughout the U.K. and exported to many countries including U.S.A., Australia and the Middle East.
